## Whats new!!!. 

### -v1.1.8 
 * Moved all screen to front. 
 * Added Watching and Planning Airing Schedule Filtering
 * Weekly Airing Schedule in Home Screen.
 * Added Weekly filtering with header inside Airing Schedule
 * Added Filtering with multiple Formats.
 * Persistent Filtering in List.
 * Added Radio Section.
 * Added card description in home screen (Can be disabled)
 * Add sorting and disabling of different screen of home screen.
 * Fixed bug with decimal format scoring.
 * Some RTL ui issue fixed.
 * AniList profile color sync after login.
 * Notification setting synced with AniList. 
 * Added AniList List Setting. 
 * Added AniList Media Setting. 
 * Added shortcut in home screen app. 
 * Bug fixes and opt. 
 * etc.

### -v1.1.7 
 * Added cardview inside anime/manga list 
 * Added user list status indicator in media. 
 * Added search and notification menu in anime/manga list 
 * Deeplink to url(anime/manga/user) to show app in app chooser 
 * Ui changes. 
 * Bug fixes and optimization 

### Huge thanks to translator for their support 
 * Italian - Yoshimitsu 
 * Hindi - Manoj Chetry (KcMj) 
 * Portuguese - Satoru 
 * Spanish - ricardoric_03 
 * Arabic - Sakugaky 

### -v1.1.6-base 
 * Code is OpenSource [Github](https://github.com/rev0lgenX/AniLib). Visit to contribute or file an issue. 
 * Join Discord to directly communicate about features, bugs and issues. [Discord](https://discord.com/invite/Gd2TVQT) 
 * Choose startup page from setting. 
 * Added check for update. Will notify if there is new update. 
 * UI changes. 

### -v1.1.5-base 

* tags, genre include/exclude ui changes 
 * display mode in anime/manga list 
 * ui changes 
 * bug fixes 

### -v1.1.4-base 

* anime/manga list sorting 
 * adding/removing genre, tags and others moved to setting 
 * added watching/reading on discover page for tracking 
 * change order of discover page from discover menu 
 * media list in users anime/manga stats 
 * exclude tags and genre from search filter 
 * graph formatting changes 
 * ui changes 
 * optimization and bug fixes 

### -v1.1.3-base 

* Added user search in search type.
 * Bug fixes when adding to list.
 * Anime/Manga List not showing all media issue fixed.
 * User Studio Stats showing Genre stats instead of Studio issue fixed.
 * Bug fixes.

### -v1.1.2-base 
 * Added custom tag feature to manually add tags, genre and streams.
 * optimization. 

### -v1.1.1-base 
 * Added Advance Scoring.
 * Completed Date not persisting fixed.
 * crash fixes.
 * optimization.

### -v1.1.0-base 
 * New Design. Customizable theme.
 * Browse media with complete detail.
 * Browse Suggestion.
 * Search Anime, Manga, Studio, Staff with customization
 * Airing Schedules.
 * Responsive bookmark icon.
 * Supports Spoiler text, images, youtube, etc
 * Support markdown for image, youtube, video, gif, etc
 * See all the reviews and give review on media
 * See user list, favourites, stats.
 * User Info.
 * In-built login.
